message: Let's get this started! I'm offering you $300,000, leaving me with $700,000. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but still a good deal. Take it or leave it!
You're being a bit stingy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not afraid to take a risk! I'll give you the majority of the money this time. Will you take it?
